languages.text: Инцендия Чорда намерена привести к Имперскому Согласию мир Беззаконие, и ей предстоит длительная кампания по зачистке планеты от богохульных элементов. Она щедро заплатит за грозных стальных гигантов Кьявы Гамма, облаченных в покров священной брони и боеукомплектованных праведной яростью Императора.

Intent on bringing the world of Iniquity to Imperial Compliance, Incendia Chorda is facing a prolonged campaign to weed out the planet's blasphemous element. She will pay a generous price for the formidable steel giants of Kiava Gamma, vested in holy armour and armed with the Emperor's righteous fury.
languages.original_text: Инцендия Чорда намерена привести к Имперскому Согласию мир Беззаконие, и ей предстоит длительная кампания по зачистке планеты от богохульных элементов. Она щедро заплатит за грозных стальных гигантов Кьявы Гамма, облаченных в покров священной брони и боеукомплектованных праведной яростью Императора.

traits.locale_text: Intent on bringing the world of Iniquitas to Imperial Compliance, Incendia Chorda is facing a prolonged campaign to weed out the planet's blasphemous element. She will pay a generous price for the formidable steel giants of Kiava Gamma, vested in holy armour and ammunitioned with the Emperor's righteous fury.

Intent on bringing the world of Iniquitas to Imperial Compliance, Incendia Chorda is facing a prolonged campaign to weed out the planet's blasphemous element. She will pay a generous price for the formidable steel giants of Kiava Gamma, vested in holy armour and ammunitioned with the Emperor's righteous fury.

Intent on bringing the world of Iniquitas to Imperial Compliance, Incendia Chorda is facing a prolonged campaign to weed out the planet's blasphemous element. She will pay a generous price for the formidable steel giants of Kiava Gamma, vested in holy armour and armed with the Emperor's righteous fury.

Intent on bringing the world of Iniquity to Imperial Compliance, Incendia Chorda is facing a prolonged campaign to weed out the planet's blasphemous element. She will pay a generous price for the formidable steel giants of Kiava Gamma, vested in holy armour and armed with the Emperor's righteous fury.

Intent on bringing the world of Iniquity to Imperial Compliance, Incendia Chorda is facing a prolonged campaign to weed out the planet's blasphemous element. She will pay a generous price for the formidable steel giants of Kiava Gamma, vested in holy armour and armed with the Emperor's righteous fury.

languages.text: En vez de traer el mundo de Iniquidad al Sometimiento Imperial, Incendia Chorda libra una prolongada campaña para erradicar el elemento blasfemo del planeta. Ofrece un generoso pago por los formidables gigantes mecánicos de Kiava Gamma, ataviados con armadura sagrada y armados con la justa cólera del Emperador.
languages.original_text: Intent on bringing the world of Iniquity to Imperial Compliance, Incendia Chorda is facing a prolonged campaign to weed out the planet's blasphemous element. She will pay a generous price for the formidable steel giants of Kiava Gamma, vested in holy armour and armed with the Emperor's righteous fury.

traits.locale_text: En vez de traer el mundo de Iniquidad al Sometimiento Imperial, Incendia Chorda libra una prolongada campaña para erradicar el elemento blasfemo del planeta. Ofrece un generoso pago por los formidables gigantes mecánicos de Kiava Gamma, ataviados con armadura sagrada y armados con la justa cólera del Emperador.

languages.text: Décidée à ramener le monde d'Iniquité dans le giron de l'Imperium, Incendia Chorda s'est lancée dans une longue campagne visant à débarrasser la planète de toute présence blasphématoire. Elle est prête à payer un bon prix les redoutables géants d'acier de Kiava Gamma, protégés par leur armure sacrée et mus par la sainte colère de l'Empereur.
languages.original_text: Intent on bringing the world of Iniquity to Imperial Compliance, Incendia Chorda is facing a prolonged campaign to weed out the planet's blasphemous element. She will pay a generous price for the formidable steel giants of Kiava Gamma, vested in holy armour and armed with the Emperor's righteous fury.

traits.locale_text: Décidée à ramener le monde d'Iniquité dans le giron de l'Imperium, Incendia Chorda s'est lancée dans une longue campagne visant à débarrasser la planète de toute présence blasphématoire. Elle est prête à payer un bon prix les redoutables géants d'acier de Kiava Gamma, protégés par leur armure sacrée et mus par la sainte colère de l'Empereur.

languages.text: 为了将这个邪恶的世界纳入帝国正义的统治，因森蒂娅·库尔达做好了旷日持久的战斗准备，发誓要将这颗行星上的亵渎分子全数铲除。她十分乐意为基亚瓦伽马星无坚不摧的钢铁巨人支付慷慨的报酬，让这群身披圣甲的战士藉着神皇的义愤烧尽一切邪恶。
languages.original_text: Intent on bringing the world of Iniquity to Imperial Compliance, Incendia Chorda is facing a prolonged campaign to weed out the planet's blasphemous element. She will pay a generous price for the formidable steel giants of Kiava Gamma, vested in holy armour and armed with the Emperor's righteous fury.

traits.locale_text: 为了将这个邪恶的世界纳入帝国正义的统治，因森蒂娅·库尔达做好了旷日持久的战斗准备，发誓要将这颗行星上的亵渎分子全数铲除。她十分乐意为基亚瓦伽马星无坚不摧的钢铁巨人支付慷慨的报酬，让这群身披圣甲的战士藉着神皇的义愤烧尽一切邪恶。

languages.text: インセンディア・チョーダは、この惑星を帝国法規に従わせるべく、この惑星の神を冒涜する要素を排除する長期的な軍事作戦を展開している。彼女は聖なる鎧に身を包み、皇帝の正義の怒りによって武装した、キアヴァ・ガンマの恐るべき鋼鉄の巨人たちをもって、気前のいい代償を払うことになるだろう。
languages.original_text: Intent on bringing the world of Iniquity to Imperial Compliance, Incendia Chorda is facing a prolonged campaign to weed out the planet's blasphemous element. She will pay a generous price for the formidable steel giants of Kiava Gamma, vested in holy armour and armed with the Emperor's righteous fury.

traits.locale_text: インセンディア・チョーダは、この惑星を帝国法規に従わせるべく、この惑星の神を冒涜する要素を排除する長期的な軍事作戦を展開している。彼女は聖なる鎧に身を包み、皇帝の正義の怒りによって武装した、キアヴァ・ガンマの恐るべき鋼鉄の巨人たちをもって、気前のいい代償を払うことになるだろう。

languages.text: Incendia Chorda ist fest entschlossen, die Welt Iniquity zur imperialen Konformität zu zwingen, und führt einen langwierigen Feldzug, um die blasphemischen Elemente des Planeten auszumerzen. Sie zahlt einen großzügigen Preis für die formidablen Stahlriesen von Kiava Gamma, die heilige Rüstungen tragen und mit dem rechtschaffenen Zorn des Imperators bewaffnet sind.
languages.original_text: Intent on bringing the world of Iniquity to Imperial Compliance, Incendia Chorda is facing a prolonged campaign to weed out the planet's blasphemous element. She will pay a generous price for the formidable steel giants of Kiava Gamma, vested in holy armour and armed with the Emperor's righteous fury.

traits.locale_text: Incendia Chorda ist fest entschlossen, die Welt Iniquity zur imperialen Konformität zu zwingen, und führt einen langwierigen Feldzug, um die blasphemischen Elemente des Planeten auszumerzen. Sie zahlt einen großzügigen Preis für die formidablen Stahlriesen von Kiava Gamma, die heilige Rüstungen tragen und mit dem rechtschaffenen Zorn des Imperators bewaffnet sind.

languages.text: Günahkâr dünyayı İmparatorluk'a Riayet ettirmekte kararlı olan İncendia Chorda, gezegenin dine aykırı kısımlarını ayıklamak için seferini uzattı. Kutsal zırhlarını ve İmparator'un meşru hışmını kuşanmış çelik devleri Kiava Gama'dan alabilmek için yüksek bir meblağ ödemeye hazır.
languages.original_text: Intent on bringing the world of Iniquity to Imperial Compliance, Incendia Chorda is facing a prolonged campaign to weed out the planet's blasphemous element. She will pay a generous price for the formidable steel giants of Kiava Gamma, vested in holy armour and armed with the Emperor's righteous fury.
